original_text: Then the five kings of the Amorites—the kings of Jerusalem, Hebron, Jarmuth, Lachish and Eglon—joined forces. They moved up with all their troops and took up positions against Gibeon and attacked it.
korean_text: 아모리 족속의 다섯 왕들 곧 예루살렘 왕과 헤브론 왕과 야르뭇 왕과 라기스 왕과 에글론 왕이 함께 모여 자기들의 모든 군대를 거느리고 올라와 기브온에 대진하고 싸우니라

sentences.original_text: Then the five kings of the Amorites
the kings of Jerusalem, Hebron, Jarmuth, Lachish and Eglon
sentences.korean_translation: 예루살렘, 헤브론, 얏무드, 라기스, 에글론의 왕들이

sentences.original_text: They moved up with all their troops
and took up positions against Gibeon
